document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2006-03
document.heading: AN INTERIM URGENCY ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON PLACING A MORATORIUM ON THE CONVERSION OF ANY MOBILEHOME PARK CURRENTLY EXISTING IN THE CITY FROM A PARK OCCUPIED PRIMARILY OR EXCLUSIVELY BY RESIDENTS OVER THE AGE OF 55 YEARS SENIOR RESIDENTS) TO A MOBILEHOME PARK ALLOWING RESIDENTS OF ALL AGES
